TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DynamicDataExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class DynamicDataExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供 ASP.NET 动态数据所使用的扩展方法。

span.span: Provides extension methods that are used by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

related.span: 扩展方法（C# 编程指南）

span.span: Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)
Extension Methods (Visual Basic)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关格式设置选项的信息，请参阅 类型概述。For information about formatting options, see the type overview. ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. 该示例从配置为接受日期时间数据的字段模板获取用户输入。The example gets user input from a field template that is configured to accept date-time data. 在 DynamicData\FieldTemplates\ DateTime_Edit .ascx 或 DynamicData\FieldTemplates\ DateTime_Edit .ascx 文件中，方法将空字符串转换为 `null` 。In the DynamicData\FieldTemplates\DateTime_Edit.ascx.cs or DynamicData\FieldTemplates\DateTime_Edit.ascx.vb file, the method converts empty strings to `null`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/DateTime_Edit.ascx.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void EnablePersistedSelection (this System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl);
.method public static hidebysig void EnablePersistedSelection(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Sub EnablePersistedSelection (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)
static member EnablePersistedSelection : System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("Use the EnablePersistedSelection property on a databound control such as GridView or ListView.")]
[<System.Obsolete("Use the EnablePersistedSelection property on a databound control such as GridView or ListView.")>]
[System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

param.name: dataBoundControl
param.span: 数据绑定控件。

span.span: The data bound control.

summary.span: 使选定内容能够保留在支持选择和分页的数据控件中。

span.span: Enables selection to be persisted in data controls that support selection and paging.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在扩展 并支持选择、分页和排序的控件中，调用此方法会使控件即使在所选行不可见时也能持久保存。In controls that extend and that support selection, paging, and sorting, calling this method enables the control to persist selection even when the selected row is not visible. 例如，如果用户选择某行，然后选择页到另一个页面，或用户对数据进行排序，则所选行仍将保持选中状态。For example, if the user selects a row and then pages to another page, or if the user sorts the data, the selected row remains selected. 如果未调用此方法，则在用户页或对其进行排序时，选择将丢失。If this method is not called, selection is lost when the user pages or sorts. 方法调用 。The method calls .

param.name: dataSource
param.span: 数据源对象。

span.span: The data source object.

summary.span: 将动态筛选器扩展到可供数据源使用的 参数中。

span.span: Expands dynamic filters into parameters that are usable by the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将和控件的当前实例的值展开 为 `Where` 可在数据源的查询中使用的参数。This method expands the values of the current instances of the and controls into `Where` parameters that are usable in queries by the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource FindDataSourceControl (this System.Web.UI.Control current);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource FindDataSourceControl(class System.Web.UI.Control current) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function FindDataSourceControl (current As Control) As IDynamicDataSource
static member FindDataSourceControl : System.Web.UI.Control -> System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource

param.name: current
param.span: 一个控件，位于您要查找其包含控件的数据绑定控件的层次结构中。

span.span: A control inside the hierarchy of a data-bound control whose containing control you want to find.

summary.span: 返回与指定控件的数据控件关联的数据源。

span.span: Returns the data source that is associated with the data control for the specified control.

returns.span: 与指定控件的数据控件关联的数据源。

span.span: The data source that is associated with the data control for the specified control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何查找包含数据源控件。The following example shows how to find the containing data source control. 在此示例中，将动态数据页模板复制到 \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions 文件夹，以提供 AdventureWorksLT 数据库的 ProductDescription 表的自定义显示。In the example, the Dynamic Data page templates are copied to the \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions folder to provide a custom display for the ProductDescription table of the AdventureWorksLT database. 更改了 Insert .aspx 文件标记以添加名为的 `OnDataBound` 事件处理程序 `DetailsView1_DataBound` ，在该处理程序中 调用方法以查找数据源控件。The Insert.aspx file markup is changed to add an `OnDataBound` event handler named `DetailsView1_DataBound`, in which the method is called to find the data source control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx#2)]

param.name: control
param.span: 包含控件。

span.span: The containing control.

param.name: columnName
param.span: 列的名称。

span.span: The name of the column.

summary.span: 返回指定控件的命名容器中指定列的字段模板。

span.span: Returns the field template for the specified column in the specified control's naming container.

returns.span: 指定控件的命名容器中指定列的字段模板。

span.span: The field template for the specified column in the specified control's naming container.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何查找指定列名称的文本框控件。The following example shows how to find the text box control for a specified column name. 例如，动态数据页模板将复制到 \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions 文件夹，以提供 AdventureWorksLT 数据库的 ProductDescription 表的自定义显示。In example, the Dynamic Data page templates are copied to the \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions folder to provide a custom display for the ProductDescription table of the AdventureWorksLT database. 已更改 Insert .aspx 文件标记以添加 `OnDataBound` 名为的事件处理程序 `DetailsView1_DataBound` ，在该处理程序中 调用方法来查找文本框控件。The Insert.aspx file markup is changed to add an `OnDataBound` event handler named `DetailsView1_DataBound`, in which the method is called to find a text box control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx#2)]

[!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx#2)]
